info.name: Jira Compact Sprint Board and Backlog
info.description:
Makes the sprint board and backlog more compact so you can see more issues at a glance. 

Developed against JIRA Server 7.3 and 7.4
info.additionalInfo:
Updates:

2017-07-20: Fix some broken styling on the backlog and sprint board after JIRA 7.4 update.

2017-04-18: Clean up the spacing of sections (sprints) on backlog view

2017-04-07: Fix sizing on hovered editable fields at top of backlog. Also adjust spacing of extra fields on issue cards.
